text: I’ve been forced into isolation many times in my life as an immunocompromised person. Yet, it’s always been because I didn’t feel well. This time, I feel fine and so are my neighbors, coworkers and friends.  #quarantinelife #Chloroquine  full post: https://t.co/Ufxy8zlmjH https://t.co/xKo0k9UUE5
